Name: Melenda
description:
Melenda works hard to support her family. She is a married woman and has a business farming seaweed in the Philippines. Melenda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF.

Melenda is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional equipment for her seaweed farming business such as floats, ropes and other necessary items. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream of saving money to expand her business.
